pagetitle: amPie
---

```{r,echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
require(package = "rAmCharts", quietly = TRUE)
require(package = "pipeR", quietly = TRUE)
```

# Basic example

```{r}
data_pie <- data.frame(label = c("Facebook", "Twitter", "LinkedIn", "Google+", 
                                 "Pinterest"),
                       value = c(38, 25, 15, 14, 8), stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

amPie(data = data_pie) %>>% plot()
```
